app.name: Sonic Mania
app.short_description: By the Mania for the Mania
app.long_description: Notes: * Put your 'Data.rsdk' file in the 'v5' folder in the 'RSDK' folder on the SD card. The full path should be '[sd card]/RSDK/v5/Data.rsdk'. * If you own the Sonic Mania Plus DLC, then you can enable it by editing the 'RSDK/v5/Settings.ini' file to have the 'dlcEnabled' variable set to 'y'. * To change the username that pops up in the main menu, set the 'username' variable in 'RSDK/v5/Settings.ini' to the name you'd like.
